import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from '../actions/authActions' const Header = ({ history }) => { const [showLogin, setShowLogin] = useState(true) const userLogin = useSelector((state) => state.userLogin) const { loading, error, userInfo } = userLogin const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { if (!userInfo) { console.log('userInfor true = ', userInfo) setShowLogin(true) } else { console.log('userInfor false = ', userInfo) setShowLogin(false) } }, [userInfo]) const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) } return ( <>
